Paoli Dam Wiki | Age | Height | Biography | Husband | Family

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Paoli Dam (পাওলি দাম) is a Bengali Film Actress & Model. She is started for her acting career in Bengali serial Jibon Niye Khela. Paoli debut in Bengali movie by Agnipariksha and she made Bollywood debut in Hate Story. She also a Very Famous Name in the Indian Television Industry.

Biography & Wiki

Paoli Dam’s nickname is Paoli. She was born on 4 October 1980 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. Hence, her current age is 39 years. Paoli’s Zodiac is Libra.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Hair ColorBlack
Eye ColorDark Brown

Family Members

Her father and mother are Amol Dam and Papiya Dam respectively. She also has a brother, Mainak.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Paoli Dam get married to Bengali Businessman living in Guwahati, named Arjun Dev. Arjun is from a wealthy family. Certainly, He studied first in Indore, followed by San Francisco. After back home, now he is associated with the paternal business.

Favourite Things

Favourite FoodKhichuri with ilish bhaja, Chilli Prawn Risotto, Crisp Colourful Salad, Seafood.

Paoli Dam filmography

First of all, her debut Bengali film—Teen Yaari Katha, directed by Sudeshna Roy and Abhijit Guha. Her first film release was Agnipariksha, directed by Rabi Kinagi. Also, She made her Bollywood debut in Hate Story, directed by Vivek Agnihotri and produced by Vikram Bhatt.

She also appeared in a Film Kaalbela as a playback Singer. She is also a very popular name in the Indian Television Industry. Also, She worked in Zee Bangla, ETV Bangla, Tara TV & Star Jalsha Channel Daily soap opera serials. Paoli acted in serials such as Jibon Niye Khela, Mahanyak, Scandal, Jaya, Sonar Harin, etc.

Salary and Net Worth

Paoli asks for 2.5 lakh per movie as a salary. Hence, Her net worth is not available.

Education and School, College

Paoli attended Loreto School in Bowbazar, before passing her Higher Secondary Examination. Furthermore, She was a good student, winning scholarships.

She was admitted to Vidyasagar College, affiliated with the University of Kolkata, graduating with a degree in chemistry. She earned a postgraduate degree in chemistry from Rajabazar Science College of the University of Calcutta.

Facts about Paoli Dam

  • There was a controversy for Paoli’s bold scenes in ‘Hate Story’.
  • In 2011, she received international recognition for her role in the Bengali film Chatrak. Above all, the film was screened at the Cannes film festival and also at film festivals in Toronto and the U.K.
  • Also, She worked on the Konkani film “Baga Beach”.
  • Furthermore, She is a classical dancer.
